code: import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import'./Question.css';import Container from'./Container';import BasicButton from'./BasicButton';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var Question=function Question(){var navigate=useNavigate();var onFlavorClick=function onFlavorClick(selection){console.log('selection: ',selection);navigate('/send-code');};var flavors=['Vanilla','Chocolate','Cookie Dough','Mint Chip','Rocky Road','Coffee'];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Container,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Of these flavors, which do you like the most?"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flavor-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"flavor-column",children:flavors.filter(function(item,idx){return!(idx%2);}).map(function(flavor,index){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(BasicButton,{buttonTitle:flavor,clickFunction:function clickFunction(){return onFlavorClick(flavor);}},index+flavor);})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"flavor-column",children:flavors.filter(function(item,idx){return idx%2;}).map(function(flavor,index){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(BasicButton,{buttonTitle:flavor,clickFunction:function clickFunction(){return onFlavorClick(flavor);}},index+flavor);})})]})]});};export default Question;
